mapper.select:
SELECT DISTINCT t1.id as id, t1.from_name as fromName, t1.prefix_url AS prefixUrl, t1.apply_type AS applyType, t1.approval_type AS approvalType, t1.process_definition_key AS processDefinitionKey, t1.version AS version, t1.model_key AS modelKey, t2.SUSPENSION_STATE_ AS suspensionState FROM bpm_task_from t1 LEFT JOIN act_re_procdef t2 ON t1.process_definition_key = t2.ID_ where 1 = 1 and t1.from_name like CONCAT('%',#{fromName},'%') and t2.version like CONCAT('%',#{version},'%') and t1.model_key like CONCAT('%',#{modelKey},'%')
and ${sql_filter}
